title: Downloads button not opening file in application
content: When I was previously using Firefox in Kubuntu 22.04, if I downloaded something I could go to the Downloads icon and click on the download and it would open in the desired application. After a failed upgrade to 24.04 I had to do a reinstall and now in Kubuntu 24.04, if I click on a downloaded file it will always bring up a window with "Open the file link with okular?" and the buttons Cancel and Open Link below. How do I go back to the previous way of it working?
creator: mfraz74

title: Two scroll positions restore on back/forward
content:
I see a strange bug in FF desktop. It‚Äôs a bit convoluted to explain but let me try

1. I have a container web page https://htmag.co.il/forum10

It basically hosts a full height Iframe

2. So it is in fact the one scrolling (not the Iframe), so scroll down to about 50% of the page.

3. After scrolling down Navigate to an internal page by clicking a link. Scroll will reset to top

4. You can do this again just in case.

5. Now move back to the list of posts (the first link). The scroll position is lost.

I think this is because there are multiple scroll positions confusing it.

title: Passwords not syncing on devices
content:
Passwords not syncing on devices

I went through and updated all the passwords on my laptop. However, when I checked my phone and iPad, none of the deleted or updated passwords have synced. I have tried deleting and reinstalling the apps, logging in and out, and ensuring that password syncing is enabled, but the issue persists.

I would appreciate support on how to proceed. While I could manually update them again, it would be a time-consuming process when they should simply sync automatically.

Thanks.
creator: bbygkp1

title: I would like to search history, but exclude certain sites or words from the results. How?
content:
So, I have a fairly large browser history that I keep for a long time. There are some sites in it that I've not visited very often, but trying to find them with a particular search returns a whole bunch of data that is from a site that isn't the one I'm looking for. I'd like to exclude certain sites from a history search, but there doesn't seem to be any documentation about how to do that.

Is it even possible to exclude words from history results?

title: When using chat software, shortcut key conflicts occur, and the sidebar will still open when using shortcut keys after being closed
content:
When using chat software, there may be shortcut key conflicts, and the sidebar will still open when using shortcut keys even after being closed. 

In the settings, the AI robot is turned off, but when using shortcut keys, the options for the AI robot will still be turned on by itself and cannot be turned off.

title: Firefox blocking Netzero emails
content:
I've used Firefox for several years without any problems however last week Firefox started blocking my Netzero emails and gives me the following message every time: 

  Blocked by Avira NetProtection   Detection name: HTML/ExpKit.Gen2   Url: webmail.netzero.net/?cf=sp   File size: 630   Content type: text/html   Calling process id: 12144   Calling process path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe

I've tried unblocking popups and that has not worked. I do not have "avira net protection" installed on my computer. The same problem exists with Google Chrome but DuckDuckGo connects to my email OK. If you reply directly please reply to [edited from public] @netzero.com not the gmail address.
creator: delmassom
